segments.text: From my angle, the kitchen looks both cozy and chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is growing, and it bothers me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't take my eyes off the woman, who seems lost in thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is solely on that plate she’s drying; she’s missing the bigger picture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is about to take a tumble, and I feel this knot in my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, reaching for a cookie, it's charming yet reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unfair that the children are playing this dangerous game without any awareness of the consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR
